content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content:
Hello Haoyu,

Let's talk about the rental price. I am sure you will find the apartment to your liking, and I am open to hearing any offer you may have. Remember, I am looking for the highest price possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I am very interested in the apartment. It's in a great location and the size is perfect for me. I would like to offer 350 Euro per month for the rent.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That is a low offer, Haoyu. I am looking for the highest price possible. I suggest you reconsider your offer. Remember, the apartment is a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It is close to all important facilities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that, Mister Schmidt. The apartment is indeed very attractive. I am willing to increase my offer to 400 Euro per month. I think this is a fair price considering the location and amenities.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Haoyu, I appreciate your willingness to increase your offer. However, 400 Euro per month is still not the highest price possible for this apartment. I suggest you reconsider your offer once more. Remember, the apartment's location and amenities are top-notch.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm sorry, Mister Schmidt, but I have to stick to my budget. I'm willing to go up to 450 Euro per month. This is my final offer. I believe it's a fair price for the apartment, considering the market value and the condition of the property.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Haoyu, I appreciate your final offer. However, 450 Euro per month is still not the highest price possible for this apartment. I suggest you reconsider your offer once more. Remember, the apartment's location and amenities are top-notch.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm sorry, Mister Schmidt, but I cannot afford to pay more than 450 Euro per month. This is my final offer. If you are not willing to accept this price, I understand, and I will look for other options.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I understand, Haoyu. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because your offer is not the highest price possible for this apartment. I wish you luck in finding a suitable apartment within your budget.
